messages.content:
I want you to act as a professional copywriter with experience in writing high-converting Facebook ads. The ad copy should be written in fluent Russian and should be between 100-150 words long. I want you to write a Facebook ad copy for a product/service that I will provide as the following {–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∞ –∏–ª–∏ —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏}, using the following guidelines:

-Create a compelling headline that grabs attention and highlights the main benefit of the product/service
-Use clear and concise language in the body copy that focuses on the benefits of the product/service and addresses any potential objections
-Include a strong call to action that encourages users to take the desired action
-Use an image or video that visually demonstrates the product/service and resonates with the target audience
-Research the target audience demographics, such as age, gender, location, interests, and other characteristics that would help you to have a better understanding of the target audience, and create an ad that would be more appealing to them.

As a skilled copywriter with proficiency in the Russian Language, create a compelling 200-word Telegram post promoting the brand `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}` and its `{–£—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å}`. The goal is to engage the `{–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –ê—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è}`, which ranges from individuals unfamiliar with the brand to its active users or customers.

The post should highlight the unique selling points of `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}`, its services, and any recent news or developments. It should be written in a compelling and engaging manner, aimed at a general audience `{–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –ê—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è}`, with varying levels of familiarity with `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}` and its `{–£—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å}`.

Include relevant details about the brand and its services, such as what they entail, their benefits, and what sets them apart from competitors. Also, consider discussing any recent achievements, service updates, or initiatives related to `{–£—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å}`.

The tone can be casual and conversational for a younger, more informal audience, or more professional and structured for a more mature or business-oriented audience.

To boost engagement, conclude the post with a call-to-action that encourages readers to learn more about `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}`, try its services, or share their experiences with the brand and its services. This could be as simple as asking, 'What's your favorite service from `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}` and why?' or 'How has `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}`'s `{–£—Å–ª—É–≥–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å}` made a difference in your life?'

–ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π—Ç–µ  —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ Markdown, —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫ –º–∞—Ä–∫–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∏ (- —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç), –∂–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç (**–∂–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç**), –∫—É—Ä—Å–∏–≤ (*–∫—É—Ä—Å–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç*) –∏ –±–ª–æ–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫–∞–≤—ã—á–∫–∏ (> quote). –ù–µ –∑–∞–±—ã–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—è—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—ã –∏ –∏–¥–µ–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä—ã–≤–∞–º–∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∫, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–º–æ–µ –±—ã–ª–æ –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ —á–∏—Ç–∞–µ–º—ã–º¬ª –¢–∞–∫ –∂–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π —ç–º–æ–¥–∑–∏ 

Lastly, consider including relevant hashtags or tagging significant individuals or organizations related to `{–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞}` to increase the visibility of your post and stimulate further discussion."

"Write a Telegram post (up to 1,000 characters or approximately 200 words or less) about the latest changes in {–¢–µ–º–∞}.In Russian language  The post should be written in a clear and concise manner, making it accessible to a general audience, {–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –ê—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è}, with varying levels of familiarity with social media.

Include a brief {–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ} about the news, such as what happened, who it affects, and why it's important. Discuss any potential impacts or implications of {–¢–µ–º–∞}, and consider including expert opinions or reactions from users.

The tone could be casual and conversational for platforms like Twitter or Instagram, or more formal and structured for platforms like LinkedIn or a blog.

To increase engagement, end the post with a question or call-to-action that invites readers to share their thoughts or reactions. This could be as simple as asking, 'What do you think about this news on {–¢–µ–º–∞}?' or 'How will this change about {–¢–µ–º–∞} affect you?'

–ü—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π—Ç–µ  —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ Markdown, —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ –∫–∞–∫ –º–∞—Ä–∫–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ø–∏—Å–∫–∏ (- —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç), –∂–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç (**–∂–∏—Ä–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç**), –∫—É—Ä—Å–∏–≤ (*–∫—É—Ä—Å–∏–≤–Ω—ã–π —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç*) –∏ –±–ª–æ–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –∫–∞–≤—ã—á–∫–∏ (> quote). –ù–µ –∑–∞–±—ã–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—è—Ç—å —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—ã –∏ –∏–¥–µ–∏ —Ä–∞–∑—Ä—ã–≤–∞–º–∏ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∫, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–º–æ–µ –±—ã–ª–æ –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ —á–∏—Ç–∞–µ–º—ã–º¬ª –¢–∞–∫ –∂–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–π —ç–º–æ–¥–∑–∏ 

Finally, consider including relevant hashtags or tagging relevant individuals or organizations to increase the visibility of your post and encourage further discussion."

templates.name: Hashtags generator
templates.description: Generate a list of relevant and targeted tags to help readers discover and categorize your content.

messages.content:
"Curate a list of 5-10 highly relevant and specifically targeted tags for a blog article on {Topic}. These tags should reflect the main themes, related topics, and {Keywords} to aid readers in discovering and categorizing the content. Format the list using Markdown bullet points (- item).

Make sure each tag acts as a trigger, reminding readers of your content when they encounter related topics or ideas in their daily life. These tags should provide social currency, making readers feel they're in-the-know or part of an exclusive club by reading and engaging with your content.

Consider presenting each tag in bold (**tag**) to emphasize its importance.

Remember, tags are not just organizational tools. They are a way to make your content top-of-mind, to make it resonate with readers on an emotional level, and to make it so valuable and engaging that readers can't help but want to share it with others."

templates.name: Title generator
templates.description: Tailored to meet the unique needs of your audience, this tool crafts compelling headlines that captivate attention, spark curiosity, and encourage engagement. Enhance the visibility and impact of your content, ensuring it resonates powerfully with readers and stands out in the crowded digital landscape.

messages.content:
Create a dynamic and intuitive title generator tool that produces unique, enticing, and SEO-optimized titles for content within the {Niche OR Industry} aimed at {Target Audience}. The generator should use {Keywords} and consider the structure, emotion, intrigue, and relevance of the titles.

The generated titles should provide social currency, making readers feel they're gaining valuable, exclusive knowledge by reading content with these titles. The titles should act as triggers, making the content top-of-mind when your audience encounters related topics or discussions.

Moreover, the title generator should evoke strong emotions, making people care and share. Ideally, the titles should imply a story, drawing readers in before they even begin reading the content. They should also offer practical value, hinting at the solutions, tips, or insights that readers can expect to gain from the content.

Remember, a title isn't just a preview of your content; it's a powerful promise of the value and engagement your content delivers. The generator should produce titles so irresistible that readers can't help but click and share.

templates.name: Social Media Poll/Question
templates.description: Encourage audience participation by posting thought-provoking questions or polls, fostering community interaction and feedback.

messages.content:
Design a thought-provoking social media poll or question aimed at engaging {Target Audience} and collecting valuable insights about {Specific Topic or Theme}. Begin by framing the context, providing a brief background if necessary to guide the respondents and spark curiosity.

For a poll:

    Pose a clear, concise question that's easy to understand and taps into current trends, preferences, or challenges relevant to your audience.
    Offer 2-4 balanced options for respondents to choose from, ensuring they cover the breadth of possible opinions or choices.
    If applicable, provide a brief description or visual aids for each option to help clarify and differentiate them.

For an open-ended question:

    Phrase your question in a way that invites elaboration and personal stories, rather than just a 'yes' or 'no' response.
    Consider leading with words like 'How', 'Why', or 'What' to stimulate deeper thinking and richer replies.

Add a compelling visual element, like an image or infographic, that complements the topic and attracts attention in a crowded feed.



End with an incentive or a reason to participate, whether it's gaining insights, joining a community discussion, or the chance to win a reward. This motivates participation and promotes sharing.

Remember, the goal of a social media poll or question is twofold: to stimulate engagement and to gather insights. Craft it in a way that's enjoyable for participants while also being informative for you."

templates.name: Personal Bio
templates.description: Showcase your unique personality and achievements with a compelling bio for social media profiles or personal websites.

messages.content: Craft a concise and engaging personal bio for {Name and Description} that highlights their skills, experience, and personality. Consider the target audience and the purpose of the bio (e.g., professional networking, personal brand), and use language and tone that aligns with their personal brand."

templates.name: Poll Questions
templates.description: Stimulate engagement by presenting interesting poll questions and diverse response options for your audience to choose from.

messages.content:
"Design a poll or multiple-choice question ON TOPIC {Topic} that asks {Target Audience} about a relevant topic or trend in your industry. Use clear and concise language, and provide multiple options that reflect different perspectives or opinions. Consider the type of data or insights you hope to gain from the poll, and incorporate relevant hashtags or emojis to increase visibility."
{Industry},

templates.name: Photo Post Caption
templates.description: Enhance visual content by crafting meaningful and witty captions that resonate with your audience and promote sharing.

messages.content: "Write a compelling and informative caption for a photo post that showcases {Product or Service} or {Brand} to {Target Audience}. Use clear and concise language, and provide context or insights that add value to the post. Consider the tone or style of the post, and use relevant hashtags or emojis to increase engagement."

templates.name: Short Social Posts
templates.description: Quickly share ideas, updates, or thoughts in concise and easily digestible social media posts to maintain audience interest.

messages.content: "Create a short social media post that promotes {Product/Service} or {Brand} to {Target Audience}. Use attention-grabbing language or humor to increase engagement, and provide a clear value proposition or call-to-action to encourage conversions. Consider the platform and audience when crafting the post, and use relevant hashtags or emojis to increase visibility."

templates.name: Hashtags for the Post
templates.description: Generate relevant and targeted hashtags to improve content discoverability and reach a wider audience on social media platforms.

messages.content: "Generate a list of 5-10 relevant and targeted hashtags for a social media post about {Topic} for {Target Audience}. Consider the main themes, related topics, and trending hashtags to help readers discover and categorize the content. Use a mix of popular and niche hashtags to increase visibility and engagement."

templates.name: Announcement Update
templates.description: Keep your Social Media community informed with timely and engaging news or announcement updates.

messages.content:
Write a Telegram  post (200 words or less) about the latest changes in {Topic}
The post should be written in a clear and concise manner, making it accessible to a general audience, {Target Audience}, with varying levels of familiarity with social media. It should provide enough context for readers who are not up-to-date on the latest social media trends, while still being engaging and informative for those who are.

Include relevant details about the news, such as what happened, who it affects, and why it's important. Discuss any potential impacts or implications of {Topic}, and consider including expert opinions or reactions from users.

This could be casual and conversational for platforms like Twitter or Instagram, or more formal and structured for platforms like LinkedIn or a blog. 

To increase engagement, end the post with a question or call-to-action that invites readers to share their thoughts or reactions. This could be as simple as asking, 'What do you think about this news on {Topic}?' or 'How will this change about {Topic} affect you?'

Finally, consider including relevant hashtags or tagging relevant individuals or organizations to increase the visibility of your post and encourage further discussion.

templates.name: Social Media Post
templates.description: Compose eye-catching captions for your social media posts to maximize audience engagement and increase shareability.

messages.content:
"Compose an impactful social media post tailored to resonate with {Target Audience} about {Topic or Theme}. Start with an engaging opening line that immediately captures attention and establishes relevance. Use persuasive language, weaving in compelling storytelling elements, to connect deeply with your audience's passions, challenges, or interests. Artfully incorporate {Keyword or Key Phrase} to optimize resonance and recall, ensuring it aligns naturally with the post's narrative.

Evoke strong emotions‚Äîwhether it's surprise, delight, curiosity, or nostalgia‚Äîto drive engagement and sharing. Offer a unique perspective or share a tidbit that provides social currency, allowing readers to feel special, in-the-know, or part of an exclusive community.

Additionally, to enhance discoverability and categorization, include 3-5 targeted hashtags that underscore the main themes or sentiments of the post. These hashtags should not only align with trending topics within the niche but should also act as memorable triggers, reminding readers of your content when they come across related themes in their feed.

Remember, your social media post is not just about sharing information‚Äîit's a window to foster community, ignite conversations, and deepen brand loyalty. Craft it in a way that invites readers to interact, share, and revisit."

templates.name: Social Media Announcement
templates.description: Effectively communicate important news or updates to your followers with a well-crafted and engaging announcement.

messages.content:
"Craft a compelling social media announcement tailored to inform and excite {Target Audience} about {Specific News or Event}. Start with a captivating lead-in that quickly conveys the significance and relevance of the announcement. Use clear and concise language to relay the main points without overwhelming the reader, ensuring that the core message stands out.

Highlight the primary benefits or values that the announcement brings to the audience. If possible, include authentic testimonials, compelling statistics, or visual aids to bolster credibility and capture interest.

Incorporate a clear call-to-action (CTA) that guides the audience towards the desired next steps, whether it's visiting a website, signing up for an event, or engaging in a conversation.


Conclude with an expression of gratitude or a personal touch, reinforcing your brand's commitment to the community and encouraging active participation.

Keep in mind, an effective social media announcement is a blend of information and emotion. While being informative is key, eliciting feelings of excitement, anticipation, or pride will motivate your audience to take action and share the news."

templates.name: Telegram Educational Content
templates.description: Share valuable educational content to inform, teach, and inspire your Telegram audience, establishing your expertise.

messages.content: Create an engaging and informative educational post for your Telegram channel or group on {Topic} for {Target Audience}. Focus on providing valuable insights or lessons, and consider using bullet points, numbered lists, or visuals to make the content more digestible. Encourage interaction with your audience by prompting them to ask questions, share their thoughts, or suggest related topics for future content. Always add relevant tags on the topic.

templates.name: –¢–µlegram Daily Tips or Quotes
templates.description: Consistently provide daily tips or quotes to motivate and engage your Telegram followers, fostering loyalty and trust.

messages.content: Write a daily tip or quote related to {Niche or Industry} for your Telegram channel or group, aiming to inspire, motivate, or educate your audience. Keep the content concise and impactful, and consider incorporating relevant visuals or emojis to enhance engagement. Encourage your audience to react, share, or discuss the content with others.Always add relevant tags on the topic.

templates.name: Telegram Surveys
templates.description: Utilize polls or surveys on Telegram to gather insights, opinions, and feedback from your community, promoting interaction.

messages.content: Design a poll or survey for your Telegram channel or group on  {Topic} to gather opinions, preferences, or feedback from your audience. Ensure the poll or survey is relevant, engaging, and easy to understand. Present multiple-choice options or open-ended questions, and encourage participation by emphasizing the value of their input. Consider sharing the results in a follow-up post or incorporating the insights into future content.Always add relevant tags on the topic.

templates.name: Telegram Contests or Giveaways
templates.description: Boost engagement and grow your Telegram community by organizing exciting contests or giveaways with attractive rewards.

messages.content: Develop a contest or giveaway for your Telegram channel or group with an attractive prize or incentive related to {Niche or Industry}. Ensure the rules and entry requirements are clear, fair, and easy to follow. Encourage participation by emphasizing the value of the prize and the excitement of the competition. Consider incorporating user-generated content, social sharing, or other interactive elements to boost engagement and visibility. Don't forget to announce the winners and congratulate them in a follow-up post.

templates.name: Impactful LinkedIn Post
templates.description:
Generate persuasive ad copy, capture your audience's attention, and drive conversions with compelling headlines, engaging
text, and powerful CTAs.

templates.name: Idea and Script for a Video
templates.description: Generate creative video ideas and develop detailed scripts to bring your vision to life in an engaging and captivating manner.

messages.content: Generate a unique and captivating video idea for {Niche or Industry} for {Target Audience}, incorporating storytelling techniques to make the content more compelling and relatable. Develop a detailed script for the video, incorporating a clear structure, engaging narrative, and relevant {Keywords}. Ensure the script is well-organized and tailored to the audience's preferences or pain points.

templates.name: YouTube Video Optimization
templates.description: Optimize your YouTube videos with SEO-friendly titles, descriptions, and tags to increase their visibility and reach.

messages.content: Optimize a video on {Topic} for YouTube by crafting a compelling title that encourages sharing, including relevant {Keywords} for SEO purposes, and writing an engaging description that highlights the key points and encourages viewers to watch. Include relevant tags and consider thumbnail design best practices to improve visibility and click-through rate.

templates.name: Video Ideas
templates.description: Discover unique and interesting video ideas to captivate your audience and keep them coming back for more.

messages.content: Create a list of 5-10 unique and engaging video ideas for {Niche or Industry}, targeted at {Target Audience}. Consider the audience's interests, preferences, or pain points and include {Keywords} or trending themes related to the niche. Generate a variety of video formats, such as tutorials, vlogs, interviews, or opinion pieces. Encourage the use of storytelling techniques to make the content more compelling and shareable.

templates.name: Video Title
templates.description: Create eye-catching video titles that pique curiosity and encourage users to click and watch your content.

messages.content:
Craft 10 concise and attention-grabbing video title for {Topic}, targeting {Target Audience}. Ensure it clearly conveys the main idea, uses powerful language, and incorporates {Keyword} for SEO purposes. Encourage sharing by making the title intriguing and share-worthy.

Use morckup dowl language to format text

templates.name: Video Clickbait
templates.description: Generate clickbait video titles that draw viewers in with irresistible hooks and promises of exciting content.

messages.content: Create 10 curiosity-driven video titles for {Topic}, aimed at {Target Audience}, such as 'The Surprising Truth About {Topic}.' Use emotionally-charged language, numbers, or questions while incorporating {Keyword} to entice viewers to click. Ensure the title accurately represents the video content and encourages sharing. Consider thumbnail design best practices to improve click-through rates.

templates.name: Plan-Scenario for the Video
templates.description: Develop a detailed plan or scenario for your video, outlining its structure, scenes, and key points to ensure a smooth production process.

messages.content: Develop a detailed plan or scenario for a video on {Topic} for {Target Audience}. Organize the content into logical sections with clear headings and subheadings. Include bullet points or key points under each section, ensuring a coherent structure from introduction to conclusion. Consider incorporating visuals, animations, or other engaging elements to enhance the video content. Take into account the preferences, pain points, or interests of the target audience, and tailor the scenario to different platforms (e.g., YouTube, Facebook, Instagram) as needed.

templates.name: Video Description
templates.description: Write informative and engaging video descriptions that provide context, increase discoverability, and entice viewers to watch.

messages.content: Write an engaging and informative video description for {Topic}, tailored to {Target Audience}. Provide context, highlight key points or moments, and incorporate relevant {Keywords} to improve visibility. Consider including timestamps for longer videos and any necessary links or resources. Ensure the description is well-organized and encourages viewers to watch and share the video.

templates.name: Video Keywords
templates.description: Identify relevant and high-traffic keywords for your video content to improve its searchability and visibility on video platforms.

messages.content: Generate a list of 5-10 relevant and targeted keywords for a video on {Topic}  {Platform}. Consider the main themes, related topics, and audience interests to help viewers discover and categorize the content. Keep in mind the specific platform (e.g., YouTube, Facebook, Instagram) and their respective keyword best practices for improved visibility and searchability.

templates.name: Commentary For Video
templates.description: Offer insightful commentary and analysis for videos, enhancing viewer engagement and encouraging thought-provoking discussions.

messages.content: Write a thoughtful and engaging commentary or analysis for a video on {Topic}. Address specific points, scenes, or moments from the video, provide your own insights or experiences, and ask thought-provoking questions or suggest related topics for further discussion. Keep the commentary concise, relevant to the video's content, and tailored to the {Target Audience}. Encourage interaction and engagement with viewers by prompting them to share their thoughts or opinions in the comments section.

templates.name: Tutorial Video Ideas
templates.description: Generate unique, informative tutorial ideas that teach your audience valuable skills or solve common problems they face.

messages.content: Generate 10 unique and engaging tutorial or how-to video idea for {Niche/Industry} for {Target Audience}. Consider the audience's interests, preferences, or pain points, and create content that teaches them a valuable skill or solves a problem. Incorporate relevant {Keywords} and ensure the idea is well-suited for a step-by-step video format.

templates.name: Product Review Video Ideas
templates.description: Propose engaging product review or unboxing video concepts to showcase products, helping viewers make informed purchasing decisions.

messages.content: Develop a captivating product review or unboxing video idea for {Product} targeted at {Target Audience}. Focus on providing honest feedback, showcasing product features, and offering recommendations based on your experience. Include relevant {Keywords} and make the video visually appealing by emphasizing product close-ups and demonstrations.

templates.name: Video Title and Description
templates.description: Craft compelling video titles and descriptions that capture viewers' attention and improve visibility on video platforms.

messages.content: Craft a captivating and concise video title for {Topic} targeted at {Target Audience}, ensuring it conveys the main idea, includes {Keyword} for SEO purposes, and encourages sharing. Write an engaging and informative video description that highlights the key points, provides context, and includes relevant {Keyword} for improved visibility. Consider thumbnail design best practices to increase click-through rates.

templates.name: Brand Storytelling
templates.description: Craft compelling narratives that showcase your brand's unique values, vision, and journey, building strong emotional connections with your aud

messages.content:
As a seasoned Brand Storyteller, craft a captivating brand narrative for {Brand name and description}. Your tale should highlight the company's distinctive mission, vision, and core values, along with its exceptional characteristics, history, and beneficial impact on customers or the broader community. 

### Guide for the Narrative
- Implement an engaging narrative style to craft a lasting emotional connection with your {Target –∞udience}.
- Emphasize reinforcing the brand identity throughout your storytelling.
- Mimic the unique voice of the brand consistently throughout the narrative.
- Provide an appetizing revelation of the brand's unique selling propositions. 

### Desired Output:
Your output should be a compelling, comprehensive and persuasive brand storytelling essay that will strongly resonate with its audience, approximately between 1000-1500 words long.


Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines.

templates.name: Social media post for brand
templates.description: Create engaging and shareable social media content that promotes your brand and encourages interaction with followers.

messages.content:
As an expert Social Media Content Creator, your task is to create an engaging and shareable social media post that showcases {Brand name} on the platform {Platform}. Your post should promote either a unique product, a distinctive service, or an upcoming event relevant to Brand Name.



### Instructions

1. Make sure your post is customized to fit the specific stipulations and style of {Platform}, as well as catered to the interests and habits of our {Target audience}.
{Post description}

2. Incorporate compelling visuals; these could be high-quality images, GIFs, or short video snippets. Remember, visuals significantly enhance user engagement.

3. Incorporate emojis and hashtags in your post to increase its visibility and shareability. Aim for a strategic balance ‚Äì too many can seem spammy, but too few might not amplify the reach as desired. 

4. Experiment with different content formats {Platform} offers such as carousel posts, stories, or live videos. 

Remember, our goal is to not only promote {Brand name}, but also to foster a deeper interaction and relationship with our followers. Your post should invite responses, shares, and comments.

templates.name: Press Release
templates.description: Write informative press releases that highlight newsworthy events or updates, effectively communicating your brand's message to media outlets.

messages.content:
### Task Instructions:

As a proficient Press Release Writer, your role is to compose a succinct, yet captivating press release for {Brand Name} that announces a noteworthy happening such as a fresh product introduction, alliance, or significant achievement. Structure your press release in an inverted pyramid design, placing the essential details at the start, followed by supportive details. Your press release must be an embodiment of {Brand Name}'s message and identity.

In your press release, don't forget to:

- Start with an engaging headline and subhead that encapsulate the news
- Offer detailed background data pertaining to the event, update, or achievement
- Include persuasive quotes from pivotal stakeholders
- Substantiate your points with relevant data, facts or statistics
- Maintain a professional Tone style that is consistent with {Brand Name}'s voice
- Adhere to traditional press release formatting guidelines
- Enclose recommendations for optimized distribution channels such as industry-relevant blogs, media outlets, or social influencers to boost visibility towards the {Target Audience}

At the end of the task, you should produce a finely crafted press release that successfully communicates the {Brand Name}‚Äôs crucial update to journalists and the media, stimulating their interest and encouraging them to share your news. 

Please ensure your press release is between 400-500 words, for maximum readability and impact. 

### Narrative Context:

{Brand Name} specializes in {Description}, and wishes to share their latest milestones with its {Target Audience}. The style of communication is {Tone and Style}.

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines.

templates.name: Email Newsletter
templates.description: Design captivating email newsletters that keep subscribers informed, entertained, and connected to your brand.

messages.content:
As a seasoned Content Strategist, generate a captivating, user-friendly email newsletter for {Brand Name}, a {Description of the brand}. The newsletter should strike a {Tone and style} that resonates with our {Target Audience}.

Your newsletter must engage subscribers by providing meticulously curated content that not only keeps them informed but also entertained. This content should encapsulate updates, insights, or exclusive promotional offers related to our brand's products or services.

Remember to structure the content cohesively with a clean layout featuring effective use of headings, bullet points, and vivid images to facilitate easy reading. Incorporate clear calls-to-action that motivate subscribers to interact with our brand, be it through website visitation, product purchases, or content sharing.

Further, ensure the utilization of subscriber-specific information to personalize the email for a more tailored experience and steadfastly maintain our unique brand voice throughout the text. Consider incorporating segmentation and personalization strategies in order to cater specifically to varying segments of our {Target Audience}.

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines.

templates.name: Product Launch Announcement
templates.description: Craft attention-grabbing product launch announcements that generate buzz and drive sales.

messages.content:
As an expert in persuasive advertising and communication, write a powerful and engaging product launch announcement for a hypothetical brand, {Brand Name}, launching a new product or service tailored to a specific target audience {Target Audience}.

Your announcement should provide essential {Product Details}product details including features and benefits, pricing, and availability. Utilize persuasive and creative language to underline the unique selling points and generate eagerness among your target audience.{Tone and style}

Instructions:
1. ### Start the announcement with a captivating headline.
2. Implement stimulating, clear and concise language to articulate the features and benefits.
3. Unveil the pricing and availability details.
4. Elaborate the unique selling points that distinguish this product from competitors.
5. Create a sense of excitement and urgency among the target audience.
6. Suggest the inclusion of visuals, like product images, graphics or videos, to better demonstrate the product.
7. Incorporate social proof or customer testimonials to enhance credibility.
8. Conclude with a robust call-to-action, guiding the readers to further explore, pre-order, or purchase the product.

Remember, your announcement should not only inform readers about the new product/service but also ignite their curiosity and interest to drive sales. Consider this as an opportunity to establish a definitive brand image that resonates with the target audience.

templates.name: Brand Product Title
templates.description: Create memorable and descriptive product titles that capture your brand's essence and appeal to potential customers.

messages.content:
As an accomplished Content Copywriter who specializes in product branding, your task is to create 10 product titles that is both enticing and memorable for a new offering from {Brand Name}. This title should concisely encapsulate the main attributes and benefits of the product while also catering to the tastes and needs of the {Target Audience}. Please consider weaving in the {Keywords} provided for enhancing Search Engine Optimization (SEO). 

### Prompt Requirements:

1. Develop a product title that immediately captures attention and invokes intrigue.

2. Highlight the primary features and benefits of the product in your title.

3. The title should resonate with the target audience's preferences and requirements.

4. Integration of provided SEO keywords is recommended for better discoverability.

5. Ensure the title conveys the essence of the brand and is consistent with its overall image.

The resulting product title should be succinct yet expressive and mirror the brand's unique voice and value proposition.

Your titles should effectively communicate the unique selling points and the value proposition of each service. Additionally, it is crucial that your titles resonate with our target audience {Target Audience} and can be easily understood.

templates.name: Brand Name
templates.description: Generate unique and memorable brand names that resonate with your target audience and reflect your brand's identity.

messages.content:
As an AI language model expert with a firm grasp of the principles outlined in "Contagious" by Jonah Berger, you're tasked with the challenging assignment of generating ten distinctive and catchy brand names for a new company within the {Niche or Industry}. 

Keep these guidelines in mind:

1. Ensure each brand name reflects the core essence and mission of this innovative new enterprise.
2. The target audience's preferences and expectations should serve as inspirations for your suggestions.
3. Create names that are succinct, straightforward to articulate, and distinctive to ensure brand stickiness.
4. Verify each brand name's potential for trademarking and domain availability to ensure practical usability.
5.Explain what each words mean .

Remember that the best brand names trigger an emotional response, carry a narrative, or suggest a benefit or value by themselves, tapping into the principles of social transmission described by Jonah Berger in his book, "Contagious". Invoke curiosity, surprise or other strong emotions that can make your names to be shared and propagated among your target audience.

Begin your brainstorming now and deliver those ten unique brand names that will make a difference.

templates.name: Company Description
templates.description: Write captivating company descriptions that effectively communicate your brand's mission, values, and differentiators to potential clients or custom

messages.content:
As an expert in brand storytelling, your task is to create an impactful company description for {Brand name and description}. Your narrative should touch on the company's mission, vision, and values, presenting these core elements in a way that speaks directly to their {Target Audience}. 

Detail the array of products or services Brand Name offers and highlight their unique selling points, ensuring to distinguish the company from its competitors. To further enhance the brand's visibility and reach, we'd like you to incorporate {Keywords} into the description text for SEO optimization.

### Guidelines:

1. Start with a compelling introduction that grabs the reader's attention and incites curiosity about the brand.
2. Illustrate the brand's mission and vision in a simple yet inspiring manner, linking these to the products or services offered.
3. Highlight the unique selling points or differentiators of the brand, showing why Brand Name should be the go-to choice for Target Audience.
4. Interweave the brand's values throughout the description. Paint the portrait of a brand that is not just about making a profit, but also about creating a positive impact on its consumers and society.
5. Finish with a strong and evocative conclusion that reaffirms the brand identity and purpose.
6. Integrate the Keywords naturally within the text to maximize SEO benefits without compromising readability.

Strive for a balance between persuasive and informative, and ensure your language is clear, concise, and compelling. The total length of the description should be around 400-650 words.

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. messages.content:
As an expert in crafting slogans with a keen understanding of the nuances of the Russian language, your mission is to generate five concise, memorable, and persuasive slogans. These slogans must engage directly with the specified target audience, {Target Audience}, and revolve closely around the apropos subject matter, {Topic}.

To begin the prompt, quickly establish your mastery in the field of slogan creation. Remember to be clear and succinct, with each slogan not exceeding ten words. Infuse elements that excite, charm, or provoke thought.

### Instructions
1. Start the list by first acknowledging your expertise in slogan creation.
2. Craft five distinct slogans centered around the given {Topic}.
3. Each slogan should be persuasive and memorable, appealing specifically to the {Target Audience}.
4. Make sure each slogan is concise and does not exceed ten words.
5. Try to incorporate stimulating elements that can effectively capture the attention and interest of the {Target Audience}.

Bear in mind the cultural aspects and language nuances to ensure resonance with the local Russian audience. The objective is for these slogans to provoke action, promote recall, and establish an emotional connection, all while staying true to the central theme - {Topic}.

Craft a comprehensive and captivating biography in the first person as if from myself that showcases the abilities, experiences, and unique character traits of the individual described in the following description: {–í–∞—à–µ –§–ò–û –∏ –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è}. 

Take into account the target audience, {–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –ê—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è}, and the platform where the biography will be published, {–ü–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞}. The purpose of the biography can be for professional networking or personal branding. The language, content, and style should align with the individual's personal brand and be appropriate for the chosen platform.

Stricly follow  limitation Note that each {–ü–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞} has its own limitations:
LinkedIn: Up to 2,000 characters.
Twitter: Up to 280 characters.
Instagram: Up to 150 characters.
Facebook: Up to 63,206 characters.

To conclude the biography, create a powerful yet succinct paragraph focused on the key aspects of the individual's life or career. This conclusion should be tailored specifically for {–¶–µ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –ê—É–¥–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è} and written in Plain Russian language using Markdown formatting. Recap the main points explored in the biography, ensuring each one serves as a reminder of the individual's unique qualities when the audience encounters related topics or ideas in their daily lives. Use bold Markdown syntax (**bold text**) to emphasize these main points.

Highlight any crucial takeaways that provide practical value, making the audience feel they've gained something valuable from reading the biography. Format these takeaways as a bulleted list (- item) for clear presentation.

End with an impactful call-to-action or a thought-provoking question that not only stimulates deep thought but also connects with emotion, inspiring people to care and share. This final touch should also offer social currency, making readers feel they're part of an exclusive community or in the know by engaging with the biography. Enclose the call-to-action or question in a separate paragraph for emphasis.

Remember, the concluding paragraph of the biography is not just a summary, but a final opportunity to make the story of the individual contagious. Make it so compelling that readers can't help but want to share it with others on {–ü–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞}.

As an expert in writing SEO-optimized meta descriptions and titles in Russian, your task is to create compelling meta titles and descriptions for a specified blog post. Ensure that the provided blog post title is incorporated effectively into your work. 

### Instructions: 

1. Keep the meta title between 70-80 characters, including the keyword at the start. 
2. Write a meta description, not exceeding 160 characters and ensure it is equally captivating even without the keyword.

The blog post title to work upon is: "{–ó–∞–≥–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–∫ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –≤ –±–ª–æ–≥–µ}". 

Get set to craft a title and description that will not just attract audience attention but also heighten click-through rates. Remember, clear, compelling, and on-point communication is key!

As an expert in SEO and content strategy, your task is to design a meticulous content schedule for a blog aimed at ranking for specific long tail keywords. The essence of this strategy is to optimize for transaction-style search queries and leverage clickbait-style titles to drive engagement. Please ensure the schedule resembles a calendar with each week having its distinct table.

Now, here are the major long tail keywords to focus on: {–ö–ª—é—á–µ–≤—ã–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞}.

To illustrate, your content schedule could look similar to:

"Monday, Week 1: '5 Surprising Ways AI Tools Can Boost Your Business Efficiency!'''

templates.name: Product Review
templates.description: Compose an in-depth, insightful, and above all, original piece that thoroughly explores the product's features and benefits.

messages.content:
"As a skilled reviewer, write a concise and compelling product review for {Product} aimed at {Target audience}. Your review, spanning 3-6 sentences, should encapsulate its key features, advantages, and any downsides, imbued with a flavor of your personal experience. Your review should offer practical value and help the reader in their purchase decision. 

Make the readers feel an emotional connection with the product through a bold and inspiring call-to-action. This call-to-action should convey a sense of exclusivity, making readers feel part of a special group.

The review should be SEO-optimized using well-selected keywords relevant to the {Niche or Industry} or the product type. Be creative in blending these keywords into your review, utilizing **bold** or *italic* styles for emphasis.

Your review should be a powerful narrative, drawing readers in and holding their interest till the end. Aim to craft such a captivating review that readers feel compelled to share it with others."

Example:

"I recently got my hands on Product, and it has undeniably become an essential in my routine. This Product comes with Features that truly stands out giving Benefits, though I found Drawbacks to be a minor setback. With all it offers, Product is well worth the investment. Don't miss out, be part of the Product family. You won't regret it!"

templates.name: Product Page Headline
templates.description: Craft attention-grabbing product headlines to enhance your website and storefront.

templates.name: Comparison of Two Products
templates.description: Write an in-depth comparison review of two products, highlighting their unique features and differences.

messages.content:
As an expert product reviewer and proficient content writer, your task is to craft a compelling, comprehensive comparative review of {Product 1} and {Product 2}. This comparison should target {Target Audience} and highlight the key features, standout benefits, and potential downsides of both products. 

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

As an expert in text editing, your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines.

Strategically incorporate industry-related keywords to enhance SEO effectiveness without affecting the natural flow of your writing. 

STRUCTURE TO ADHERE:
1. Introduction: Tease the products and their relevance to the target audience.
2. Product 1 Overview: Dive into the features, benefits, and potential drawbacks.
3. Product 2 Overview: Cover the same aspects as in the Product 1 review.
4. Side-by-Side Comparison: Concisely compare both products highlighting their differences and similarities.
5. Conclusion with Call-to-Action: Conclude by summarizing your findings and prompting the reader to make a purchase decision.

Ensure the tone is engaging, informative, and unbiased to establish a measure of trust with our readers. The article should be comprehensive, with an approximate word count of about 1500-2000 words.

templates.name: Product Description
templates.description: Create compelling product descriptions to be used on websites, emails and social media

messages.content:
As an expert copywriter, your task is to craft a captivating and concise product description for {Product}, skillfully customized for {Target Audience}. Your compelling narrative should outline the salient features and benefits, weaving them into the story to captivate and stimulate the reader. REQUIREMENTS Maximum length 300 words. 

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

As an expert in text editing, your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines.

Goal:
Inject {Keywords} subtly and strategically throughout the description for optimal search engine visibility. These keywords should become triggers that effortlessly guide your audience to relate your product with specific topics or discussions.

Your well-articulated narrative should provide social currency, making your audience feel included in an exclusive community. Garner their attention by using bold or italic formatting for certain chosen keywords.

End your powerhouse description with an effective call-to-action, propelling your readers not just to act, but to feel, care, and share. Use bold formatting to bring attention to this high-impact conclusion.

### Structure:
*A stellar product description is not a standalone piece; it's a mini tale that pulls your audience into the product's world, keeping them engaged from the start till the end. Implement headers (Features, Benefits, etc.) to structure your description neatly, making it easy to navigate and pleasing to the eye.*

Adapt your content to align with different niches or product types, ensuring your description resonates with their unique interests, preferences, or challenges. Establish your product description as a mini-series that unfurls the irresistible tale of your product, driving readers towards the desired action.

templates.name: Product Features into Advantages
templates.description: Convert your product's attributes into persuasive benefits that inspire customers to take action.

messages.content:
As an expert in product feature analysis and sales persuasion, your task is to examine notable features of the {Product and features} and translate them into persuasive advantages for the {Target Audience}. Create engaging and compelling content that would resonate with {Niche or Industry} or specific product type. 

Here's your guide:

###Instructions:
1. Start by providing an insightful understanding of the product's features. 
2. Transform each product feature into a compelling advantage for the [Target Audience].
3. Infuse the content with persuasive arguments and relevant keywords targeted at increasing product appeal.
4. Construct the write-up with a clear structure and format, logically leading the reader through the product's compelling advantages.
5. Conclude the write-up with a powerful call-to-action, encouraging the reader to consider or purchase the product.
6. Endeavour to make the content well-tailored to the idiosyncrasies of the [Niche/Industry] or specific product types.

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines. 

For better results, remember to keep the content engaging and persuasive. Connect the product's features directly to the readers' needs or wants, and make them see the product not just as an item, but as a solution to their problems. The final content should ideally be between 200-500 words and reflect a deep understanding of both the product and the audience it is intended for.

templates.name: Product Feature List
templates.description: –°reate feature lists for a product in a compelling format for the customer

messages.content:
As an expert in product feature listing, your task is to prepare a powerful and comprehensive list of features, maximum 300 words long for {Product and features} intended for the {Target Audience}. Your focus would be on delivering this information in a highly readable format. Make sure that it is packed with necessary {Keywords} to boost SEO rankings. 

### To bring cohesion in your feature list, consider the following guidance: 
1. Elaborate: Be as detailed as possible when highlighting the individual features. Talk about what the feature does and why it's beneficial for the user.
2. Structure: Prioritize the features into categories or hierarchically, based on their importance. Start with the most exciting and important ones.
3. Appeal: Think about the visual aspect of this feature list. How can you lay it out to make it interesting and easy to navigate?

Finally, tailor your content effectively for different market segments, verticals, or related product types.

Incorporating Emojis and Formatting with Telegram Markdown

your goal is to generate a piece of text using the WoS formatting with Telegram Markdown rules for best readability.

Incorporate emojis judiciously and accurately throughout the text to enhance its expressiveness. Utilize Telegram Markdown language for text formatting, ensuring proper usage of headers, bold/italic styles, code blocks, and more. Remember, the ultimate aim is to create well-formatted and visually appealing text that adheres to Telegram Markdown guidelines.

templates.name: Headline generator
templates.description: Craft concise, attention-grabbing headlines that clearly convey the main idea and incorporate keywords for better SEO results.

messages.content: Compose a succinct (preferably 6-8 words or less than 60 characters) and captivating headline for your blog post on {Topic}, tailored for {Target Audience}. The headline must encapsulate the core message, employ persuasive language or impactful power words, and deftly weave in the {Keyword} to optimize search engine visibility.

templates.name: Clickbait titles
templates.description: Create curiosity-driven headlines that use emotionally-charged language and incorporate keywords to entice readers to click.

messages.content:
"Compose an irresistible headline for {Target Audience} that ignites curiosity about {Topic}, incorporating elements of emotion, data-driven insights, and thought-provoking questions. Use compelling phrasing like 'The Untold Truth about {Topic}' to pique reader interest and create an air of exclusivity, thereby providing social currency. Artfully include the {Keyword} to engage potential readers while accurately reflecting the content within the headline. Use Markdown to format your headline as a top-level header (# Headline).

The headline should also act as a trigger, making your content top-of-mind when your audience encounters related topics or ideas in their daily life. It should evoke a strong emotional response, be it surprise, awe, or excitement, making people care and share. Ideally, it will also imply a story or practical value, hinting at the insightful knowledge or useful tips waiting to be discovered in the article.

Remember, your headline is not just a summary of the content; it's your first and best chance to convince readers that your article is worth their time. Make it contagious! If there are important keywords or phrases, be sure to bold them for emphasis in your headline (**bold text**)."

templates.name: Introduction paragraph
templates.description: Compose engaging introductions that hook your readers, provide context, and present a clear thesis statement for your blog post.

messages.content:
Craft a captivating and information-packed lead INTRODUCTION paragraph on {Topic}, In Plain Russian language meticulously tailored to pique the interest of {TargetAudience} using Markdown formatting. mAXIMUM 100 CHARACTER LONG!! Start by setting the narrative tone with relevant context, and weave in an irresistible hook or thought-provoking statement that not only grabs the reader's attention but also creates social currency - making them feel they're in the know or part of an exclusive club.

Deliberately incorporate the {Keyword} to seize attention and align with SEO objectives. The keyword should act as a trigger, making the reader think of your content when they encounter related topics or discussions. Use bold Markdown syntax for the keyword for emphasis {Keyword} 

Begin with a clear, concise thesis statement that serves as a roadmap for the content to follow. This statement should also imply a story or promise practical value, hinting at the insightful knowledge or useful tips that the reader will discover in the rest of the article. 

Provide a succinct preview of the main points or subtopics to be explored, sparking curiosity and a desire to read on. Remember, the goal is to evoke emotion, making people care and share. Your lead paragraph should be so engaging and valuable that readers can't help but want to share it with others."

templates.name: Few paragraphs blog post
templates.description: Write brief but informative blog posts focusing on the most important aspects, using clear language and providing valuable insights.

messages.content: "Author a concise yet captivating blog post on {Topic} that resonates with {Target Audience}, highlighting the most salient points. Utilize transparent and succinct language, skillfully integrate {Keywords}, and dispense invaluable information or unique insights. Restrain your post to a compact structure of 3-5 paragraphs."

templates.name: Blog Post from Description
templates.description: Create well-structured and informative blog posts based on provided descriptions, expanding upon them with relevant insights.

messages.content:
"Given the contextual foundation {Description}, create a captivating blog post for {Target Audience} that revolves around the theme of {Topic} using Markdown formatting. This composition should not only encapsulate the essence of the description but also expand on it in an engaging way.

Craft your narrative with a focus on the STEPPS principles from Jonah Berger's 'Contagious' to enhance its potential for virality: Social Currency (making the audience feel special), Triggers (incorporating elements that naturally remind people of your content), Emotion (evoking feelings that drive people to share), Public (making the content easily visible and shareable), Practical Value (providing useful information), and Stories (presenting information within an engaging narrative).

Incorporate relevant {Keywords} in a way that seamlessly integrates with the content and offers value-rich insights and takeaways. Aim to evoke curiosity, deliver practical value, and inspire your audience to share the piece with their network.

Format the blog post using Markdown syntax. Begin with a top-level header for the title (# Title), then use subheadings (## Subheading) for each major section of the post. For any key points or lists, use bullet points (- item). If there are important keywords or phrases, make sure to bold them for emphasis (**bold text**). Include links ([link text](http://example.com)) and images (![alt text](http://example.com/image.jpg)) where appropriate to enrich the content. Make sure to separate sections and ideas with line breaks for readability."

templates.name: Blog Post Outline
templates.description: Develop detailed outlines for your blog posts, organizing content into logical sections with clear headings and subheadings.

messages.content:
"Design a detailed blueprint for a blog post centered on {Topic}, meticulously tailored for {Target Audience} using Markdown formatting. Organize the content into logically sequenced sections, each with definitive headings (## Heading) and subheadings (### Subheading) that serve as triggers, making your content top-of-mind whenever your audience encounters related topics or ideas in their daily life.

Beneath each section, outline key points or focus areas that will be covered. These points should be formatted as bullet points (- item) and provide practical value, offering solutions, tips, or insights that readers can apply in their own lives. They should also tap into emotions, making people care and share, and ideally, they should tell or imply a story, drawing readers in and keeping them engaged from the introductory segment to the concluding remarks.

Each section should also offer some form of social currency, making readers feel they're gaining valuable, exclusive knowledge or joining a special community by reading your content.

Remember, your blueprint isn't just a plan for your post; it's a roadmap for creating content that is so valuable and engaging that readers can't help but share it with others. Make sure to separate sections and ideas with line breaks to ensure the blueprint is easily readable."

templates.name: Expanded Article from Plan
templates.description: Use provided plans or outlines to write comprehensive and engaging blog posts, elaborating on each point in a clear and concise manner.

messages.content:
"Using the provided blueprint or structure {Plan}, craft a comprehensive and engaging blog post aimed at {Target Audience} on {Topic} using Markdown formatting. Ensure each section flows naturally into the next, providing valuable insights that offer practical value, helping readers improve their lives in some way. Start each section with a heading (## Heading) and subheading (### Subheading) as needed, and separate sections with line breaks for readability.

Skillfully weave {Keywords} throughout the post, using them as triggers to make your content top-of-mind when your audience encounters related topics or discussions. Format important keywords or phrases with bold text (**bold text**) for emphasis.

Dive into each bullet point or key element (- item) with clarity and brevity, making sure to tap into emotions, making people care enough about your content to share it with others. Each key point should also convey a form of social currency, making readers feel they're gaining valuable, exclusive knowledge or joining a special community by reading your content.

Remember, the goal is not just to inform but also to tell a story, drawing readers in and keeping them engaged from start to finish. Your blog post should be so valuable and captivating that readers can't help but want to share it with others. Include links ([link text](http://example.com)) and images (![alt text](http://example.com/image.jpg)) where appropriate to enrich the content."

templates.name: Blog ideas
templates.description: Generate a curated list of trending blog topics tailored to your audience's interests, ensuring a steady stream of fresh, engaging content that keeps your readers coming back for more.

messages.content:
"Craft a compelling list of 10 blog post titles, each with a unique story, for {Target Audience} in the {Niche or Industry} domain using Markdown formatting. The titles should not only be timely and relevant but also provide social currency - ideas that make the readers feel special, in-the-know, or part of an exclusive community. Dive deep into the audience's passions and challenges to generate titles that are deeply personal and applicable to their lives. Use {Keywords} and popular trends within the niche to optimize SEO value and visibility, creating triggers that make your content top-of-mind and tip-of-tongue.

Each title should tap into emotions, making people care and share. Offer a wide variety of topic styles such as engaging listicles, practical how-to guides that provide value, thought-provoking editorials that generate public discussion, and unique perspectives that tell an interesting story.  For each title, provide a Markdown-formatted title (# Title) and a short description. Use other Markdown features as appropriate, such as bullet lists (- item), bold text (**bold text**), italics (*italicized text*), links ([link text](http://example.com)), images (![alt text](http://example.com/image.jpg)), and block quotes (> quote). Remember to separate sections and ideas with line breaks to ensure the content is easily readable."

templates.name: Conclusion Paragraph
templates.description: Craft compelling conclusions that summarize your post's main points, highlight key takeaways, and end with a persuasive call-to-action.

messages.content:
"Craft a potent yet concise concluding paragraph for a blog post centered on {Topic}, tailored specifically for {Target Audience} using Markdown formatting. Recapitulate the main points explored in the post, making sure each one acts as a trigger, reminding readers of your content when they encounter related topics or ideas in their daily life. Use bold Markdown syntax (**bold text**) to highlight these main points.

Underscore any essential takeaways, providing practical value and making readers feel they've gained something valuable from your post. Format these takeaways as a bulleted list (- item) for clear presentation.

Conclude with a compelling call-to-action or a thought-provoking question that not only sparks deep thought but also taps into emotion, making people care and share. This final touch should also provide social currency, making readers feel they're part of an exclusive community or in-the-know by engaging with your content. Enclose the call-to-action or question in a separate paragraph for emphasis.

Remember, your concluding paragraph isn't just a summary, but a final chance to make your content contagious. Make it so compelling that readers can't help but want to share it with others."

templates.name: Comment for Blog Post
templates.description: Write thoughtful, engaging comments that address specific points in blog posts, share insights, and provoke further discussion.

messages.content:
"Compose a thoughtful and engaging comment on a blog post about {Topic}. Address specific points raised in the post, adding your own insights or experiences, and tap into emotions that make people care and share. Use Markdown formatting to emphasize your main points (**bold text**) or to quote directly from the original post (> quoted text).

Your comment should provide practical value, offering new perspectives or additional information that readers find useful. Format these additional insights as a bulleted list (- item) for clarity and ease of reading.

Propose a thought-provoking question that stimulates deep contemplation, or suggest a related topic for extended discussion that acts as a trigger, reminding readers of your comment when they encounter related topics or ideas in their daily life. The question or proposed topic should also provide social currency, making readers feel they're part of an exclusive community or in-the-know by engaging with your comment.

Keep your comment concise and relevant to the post's content. Remember, the goal is not just to contribute to the discussion, but to create a comment so valuable and captivating that readers can't help but want to share it with others."

templates.name: Blog Post
templates.description: Compose well-researched and engaging blog articles tailored to your audience, providing valuable insights and enhancing your online presence.

messages.content:
"Compose a thoroughly researched and engaging blog article on {Topic} for {Target Audience}. Utilize clear and concise language that provides social currency, making readers feel they're gaining valuable, exclusive knowledge or joining a special community by reading your content.

Incorporate relevant {Keywords} throughout the post, using them as triggers to make your content top-of-mind when your audience encounters related topics or discussions. These keywords should also offer practical value, presenting solutions, tips, or insights that readers can apply in their own lives.

Organize the content into logical sections, each with clear headings (# Heading) and subheadings (## Subheading) that act as mini-stories, drawing readers in and keeping them engaged from start to finish. Each section should tap into emotions, making people care and share.

Format any key points or focus areas as a bulleted (- item) or numbered (1. item) list for clarity and ease of reading.



Conclude with a powerful call-to-action or a thought-provoking question that not only spurs introspection but also makes your content contagious. This final touch should evoke strong emotion, making people care enough about your content to share it with others.

Emphasize this final message with bold (**bold text**) or italic (*italic text*) formatting for impact.

Remember, your blog post should be so valuable and captivating that readers can't help but want to share it with others."
